78035721-1356-4f42-abb5-cf065fa3a0f7.description: Earners of this badge successfully position Extreme Network’s infrastructure, mobility, software and security solutions to customers as part of an overall value proposition. This is all done via the Extreme Game Center app and can be completed in short sessions over time.
78035721-1356-4f42-abb5-cf065fa3a0f7.name: Extreme Sales Specialist (ESS)

badge_template_activities.title: Download the Extreme Game Center App and play!

5766a0cf-b888-43b1-bbfe-428a5984eed9.description: Earners of this badge will have the working knowledge to install and configure a wireless network using ExtremeCloud™ IQ. Upon completion, they will be able to create and manage an ExtremeCloud™ IQ account, plan their network, add locations, configure network policies, and onboard devices. The earner can create wireless networks, configure SSID authentication and identify ExtremeCloud™ IQ Essentials applications.
5766a0cf-b888-43b1-bbfe-428a5984eed9.name: ExtremeWireless Cloud - Installation and Configuration

ab07965e-f4e8-4e10-9898-169675569c79.description: Earners of this badge will be able to properly install and configure their switching and routing environments using the ExtremeXOS/SwitchEngine CLI. Upon completion, earners will understand layer 2 and layer 3 mechanisms and ways to implement and configure them in ExtremeXOS/SwitchEngine devices.
ab07965e-f4e8-4e10-9898-169675569c79.name: Extreme Switching - Installation and Configuration

ff73cc5c-e6df-4ebb-86ea-466bde5e63c3.description: Earners of this certification will have the working knowledge to install and configure ExtremeCloud™ IQ - Site Engine. Upon completion, they will understand how to apply the Network Management Model (NMM) alongside the Open Systems Interconnection (OSI) and be able to confidently reinforce this concept with a hands-on lab in a pre-configured network.
ff73cc5c-e6df-4ebb-86ea-466bde5e63c3.name: ExtremeCloud IQ - Site Engine - Installation and Configuration

28e67978-e717-4dd6-8d21-82ab672bb30c.description: Earners of this badge can deploy Extreme Networks Fabric Connect solutions based on reference architectures from Extreme Networks customer scenarios.Upon completion, they will be able to apply hands-on experience with VSPs, Universal Hardware 5520, ERS, and EXOS. Successful completion results in an operational SPBM fabric with L2VSN, L3VsN, IP-Shortcuts, Fabric Attach and VIST Core Switch Pair.
28e67978-e717-4dd6-8d21-82ab672bb30c.name: Extreme Campus Fabric - Installation and Configuration

cd7c9b96-0780-48aa-b17d-71cd71b69616.description: This course takes a deeper dive into our ExtremeCloud™ IQ platform. Earners of this badge can answer questions such as: What is Cloud Networking, How does it work? and How do you manage it? Across the episodes, we focus on topics such as Cloud, Security, Management, Troubleshooting and Deployment.
cd7c9b96-0780-48aa-b17d-71cd71b69616.name: Extreme Certified Associate in ExtremeCloud IQ

badge_template_activities.title: Take Meet ExtremeCloud IQ exam on the Dojo platform.

2e72c379-8c67-4315-829b-cd230d97c9c7.description: Meet Fabric Connect is a 4 part series introducing learners to the power of modern network design. Earners of this badge understand topics such as: Shortest Path Bridging (SPB), Multicast, Security, IS-IS and much more. This series dives into the wonderful world of Extreme Fabric Connect, looking closely at specific Fabric scenarios and sharing how to explain these concepts.
2e72c379-8c67-4315-829b-cd230d97c9c7.name: Extreme Certified Associate in Extreme Fabric Connect

badge_template_activities.title: Take Meet Extreme Fabric Connect exam on the Dojo platform.

ebf61d94-37c1-44ee-bb1f-daf19f78b2cc.description: Earners of this badge understand the fundamentals of cloud networking technology, wireless communication, and the Internet. They will have covered topics such as the OSI Model, Application flow through the communication stack, the basic principles of Wi-Fi, the internet and managing devices on the network.
ebf61d94-37c1-44ee-bb1f-daf19f78b2cc.name: Extreme Networks Associate - Introduction to Future Networking

65b5ba4c-4d1c-441b-9e4a-6adeadab1522.description: This course takes a deeper dive into our Extreme Switching products. Earners of this badge learn about Extreme Switching, EXOS/Switch Engine, security concepts and where you can find support for any technical questions you may have. You'll also learn about the management of switches, including tools like ExtremeCloud IQ and ExtremeCloud IQ-Site Engine. We look at licensing models, introduce you to technical terms and what networkers and engineers would do on a regular basis.
65b5ba4c-4d1c-441b-9e4a-6adeadab1522.name: Extreme Certified Associate - Extreme Switching

a292da35-6df8-43e1-81c4-50cc10f2bd74.description: Earners of this badge have learnt about Wireless Networks and their importance to required business outcomes. Students take a deeper dive into the world of wireless, touch on subjects such as design best practices, standards, security and others with the goal of building robust wireless networks.
a292da35-6df8-43e1-81c4-50cc10f2bd74.name: Extreme Networks Associate - Building Secure and Robust Wireless Networks

30b61a51-d016-4931-87fc-05b65c92aba7.description: Earners of this badge will understand how to troubleshoot ExtremeCloud™ IQ. Upon completion, they can troubleshoot wireless networks using the troubleshooting tools in ExtremeCloud™ IQ such as logs and troubleshooting files. The earner will be able to explain Co-operative Control Protocols, and CAPWAP and Provisioning, Setup SSH Proxy and use the Client Monitor as required by their job role.
30b61a51-d016-4931-87fc-05b65c92aba7.name: ExtremeWireless Cloud - Troubleshooting

7417ccb0-2827-4c24-b825-5ae6c4d53ee3.description: Meet ExtremeCloud IQ – Site Engine is a 3-part series introducing learners to what a networking world looks like using ExtremeCloud IQ – Site Engine. Earners of this badge understand topics such as: the Features of ExtremeCloud IQ – Site Engine, Extreme Analytics, Licensing and much more. At the end of this course, you will understand how ExtremeCloud IQ – Site Engine integrates with ExtremeCloud IQ to provide an end to end networking experience for you and your customers.
7417ccb0-2827-4c24-b825-5ae6c4d53ee3.name: Extreme Certified Associate - ExtremeCloud IQ - Site Engine

3603112a-3173-4da9-9564-a08451b91f0c.description: Earners of this badge will have gained perspectives on the networking industry which would normally take years of experience to achieve​, understand what makes a successful career in IT and be able to articulate the major technology Megatrends shaping the networking industry.
3603112a-3173-4da9-9564-a08451b91f0c.name: Extreme Networks Associate - Advance Your Career

1d052552-681d-46be-86ea-760d3b1ea444.description: Earners of this badge will have a foundational level understanding of Wi-Fi. They will have covered topics such as how does Wi-Fi work, what are Wi-Fi Standards, Wi-Fi best practices, Security and Management.
1d052552-681d-46be-86ea-760d3b1ea444.name: Extreme Networks Associate - Building Scalable and Mission Critical Networks

e49d07c3-9bd3-4afc-afa0-44bb8cf3ea66.description: Earners of this badge can install and configure ExtremeCloud™ IQ – Controller. Upon completion, earners will understand how to use encryption, authentication, and configuration settings. As well as AP discovery and equipment profiles used in the creation and management of Sites in ExtremeCloud™ IQ - Controller.
e49d07c3-9bd3-4afc-afa0-44bb8cf3ea66.name: ExtremeCloud IQ - Controller - Installation and Configuration

d2079af0-6e67-4eb4-9a76-fdd5a8974d24.description: Earners of this badge can confidently manage ExtremeCloud™ IQ – Controller. Upon completion, earners will be able to manage users and system back-ups. In addition, they can monitor ExtremeCloud™ IQ - Controller deployment through System Health Widget and will also have a full understanding of SSH/SNMP integration with ExtremeCloud™ IQ - Site Engine.
d2079af0-6e67-4eb4-9a76-fdd5a8974d24.name: ExtremeCloud IQ - Controller - Management

2295fdc8-413c-45db-8560-f3dc80f3fba5.description: Earners of this badge will have the knowledge to manage the Fabric Connect solution. Upon completion, they will be able to add and change fabric services and add devices to an existing Fabric Connect solution. Earners will be able to utilize the new automation features including auto-sense and self-forming fabric. They can understand Extreme’s management solutions: ExtremeCloud™ IQ and the campus solution ExtremeCloud™ IQ - Site Engine, and on-board and manage switches successfully.
2295fdc8-413c-45db-8560-f3dc80f3fba5.name: Extreme Campus Fabric - Management

bcea265e-50b4-4ad9-a53e-2d7d94eca834.description: Earners of this badge will have the knowledge to manage the wireless network using ExtremeCloud™ IQ. Upon completion, they will be able to administer the global settings of their ExtremeCloud™ IQ account and confidently manage APs on the network. The earner can work with ExtremeCloud™ IQ logs and use ML Insights to monitor the wireless network.
bcea265e-50b4-4ad9-a53e-2d7d94eca834.name: ExtremeWireless Cloud - Management

7ef8cf74-d90f-4755-8a20-eb5ab329efe7.description: Earners of this badge have advanced skills in configuring ExtremeCloud™ IQ. Upon completion, they will be able to work with the ExtremeCloud™ IQ API, configure Captive Web Portal, onboard switches and routers and use the Supplemental CLI.
7ef8cf74-d90f-4755-8a20-eb5ab329efe7.name: ExtremeWireless Cloud - Advanced Configuration

1cbf82ef-2125-4c78-9f54-11d4174d6d91.description: Earners of this badge will have knowledge of the Extreme Fabric Connect advanced features. Upon completion, earners can utilize Fabric Attach to configure fabric services as well as integrate other protocols and services with Fabric Connect. They can confidently implement a DvR network with Fabric Connect and understand how to expand the campus configuration by implementing Fabric Extend.
1cbf82ef-2125-4c78-9f54-11d4174d6d91.name: Extreme Campus Fabric - Advanced Configuration

e6403b58-94c5-49a3-bf8e-0c4840d1405a.description: Earners of this badge can manage advanced applications in ExtremeCloud™ IQ – Controller. Upon completion, earners will be able to install and manage applications, create custom reports and dashboards, and be able to call API to perform functions or retrieve data from ExtremeCloud™ IQ – Controller.
e6403b58-94c5-49a3-bf8e-0c4840d1405a.name: ExtremeCloud IQ - Controller - Advanced Configuration

0f7b738b-da70-42e5-ada8-5adae9a2bf8b.description: Earners of this badge can successfully troubleshoot ExtremeCloud™ IQ – Controller. Upon completion, earners will understand wireless issues and how to detect them by diagnosing common application problems and API errors.
0f7b738b-da70-42e5-ada8-5adae9a2bf8b.name: ExtremeCloud IQ - Controller - Troubleshooting

936b1111-6796-41a0-a2b0-a62d000050b2.description: Earners of this badge will have the knowledge to attain overall network visibility in ExtremeCloud™ IQ - Site Engine and be able to access tools for device configuration and configuration archives. Upon completion, they will manage device firmware and configuration via ExtremeCloud™ IQ - Site Engine, and be able to access, generate, and customize reports.
936b1111-6796-41a0-a2b0-a62d000050b2.name: ExtremeCloud IQ - Site Engine - Management

0498a18c-fa3a-4252-bc97-38fc71c71646.description: Earners of this badge will be able to troubleshoot Extreme Fabric Connect. Upon completion, earners can utilize VOSS specific tools for troubleshooting. They can setup the management network and identify problems that may occur and identify a properly configured SPBM node to locate layer 1, layer 2 and layer 3 issues and troubleshoot as required by their job role.
0498a18c-fa3a-4252-bc97-38fc71c71646.name: Extreme Campus Fabric - Troubleshooting

e99fcd9f-5a28-4f44-abb3-97e838341c3c.description: Earners of this badge can prepare their switching and routing environment for management with ExtremeCloud™ IQ, ExtremeCloud™ IQ – Site Engine or capable 3rd party management solutions. Upon completion, earners will implement management mechanisms in ExtremeXOS/SwitchEngine devices and prepare the devices for onboarding to ExtremeCloud™ IQ, as well as ExtremeCloud™ IQ – Site Engine.
e99fcd9f-5a28-4f44-abb3-97e838341c3c.name: Extreme Switching - Management

67874b70-96ca-4d01-906e-07164583e41e.description: Earners of this badge understand and can explain the capabilities and positioning of Extreme Networks products enabling the most appropriate technology and platform to be positioned to address customer requirements.​ Furthermore, the course covers how these products can be assembled into a solution following design and scaling guidelines​.
67874b70-96ca-4d01-906e-07164583e41e.name: Solutions Design - Product Design

0d2d9b13-4c9b-464a-b722-67b8b0ece65e.description: Earners of this badge will have been tested both practically and theoretically in all aspects covered in the classes that make up the Extreme Certified professional syllabus in Extreme Campus Fabric thus proving they have an excellent grasp of all the requirements needed to install and maintain a Fabric.
0d2d9b13-4c9b-464a-b722-67b8b0ece65e.name: Extreme Certified Professional in Extreme Campus Fabric

57ca9ba8-d5dc-4f06-966d-6c67375dac93.description: Earners of this badge will understand how to troubleshoot ExtremeCloud™ IQ - Site Engine. Upon completion, they can access the tools to identify and isolate network faults and common end-user issues. They can create custom alarms and reports as required by their job role.
57ca9ba8-d5dc-4f06-966d-6c67375dac93.name: ExtremeCloud IQ - Site Engine - Troubleshooting

aa297643-6e42-4113-90a6-7819d32c56bf.description: Earners of this badge will have been tested both practically and theoretically in all aspects covered in the classes that make up the Extreme Certified professional syllabus in Extreme Wireless Cloud thus proving they have an excellent grasp of all the requirements needed to install and maintain an ExtremeCloud™ IQ. Network.
aa297643-6e42-4113-90a6-7819d32c56bf.name: Extreme Certified Professional in ExtremeWireless Cloud

dc84a0f0-667d-491c-8db3-442dc31ee624.description: Earners of this badge will have advanced knowledge of tools such as templates, workflows, automations, and integration with ExtremeCloud™ IQ. Upon completion, they will have knowledge of Extreme Analytics, Extreme Policy Manager, and Extreme Control and will be able to apply these concepts.
dc84a0f0-667d-491c-8db3-442dc31ee624.name: ExtremeCloud IQ - Site Engine - Advanced Configuration

4ed1aa60-34c0-43dd-96dc-f309f47421fe.description: Earners of this badge can use advanced methods to enhance their existing switching and routing environment. Upon completion, earners will implement security mechanisms in ExtremeXOS/SwitchEngine devices, such as ONEPolicy or ACLs as well as traffic optimisation techniques. They can also automate, integrate and enhance ExtremeXOS/SwitchEngine capabilities with features such as Fabric Attach, CLI scripting as well as Python scripting and Python processes
4ed1aa60-34c0-43dd-96dc-f309f47421fe.name: Extreme Switching - Advanced Configuration

5ff50e74-a8e4-466f-894d-57c65e3162dc.description: Earners of this badge can troubleshoot their existing switching and routing environment. Upon completion, earners can determine whether an issue is network related or not, diagnose ExtremeXOS/SwitchEngine and the network with built-in tools, resolve frequently met issues and collect support data to open case in GTAC as required.
5ff50e74-a8e4-466f-894d-57c65e3162dc.name: Extreme Switching - Troubleshooting

d0c9c4da-1b2d-4f63-ae13-eac8cd5c8d24.description: Earners of this badge will have been tested both practically and theoretically in all aspects covered in the classes that make up the Extreme Certified professional syllabus in ExtremeCloud IQ- Site Engine thus proving they have an excellent grasp of all the requirements needed to install and maintain a Network configured and managed by ExtremeCloud IQ- Site Engine.
d0c9c4da-1b2d-4f63-ae13-eac8cd5c8d24.name: Extreme Certified Professional in ExtremeCloud IQ - Site Engine

c365a04a-08d7-4113-a8ab-a8f15c253422.description: Earners of this badge will have been tested both practically and theoretically in all aspects covered in the classes that make up the Extreme Certified professional syllabus in Switching thus proving they have an excellent grasp of all the requirements needed to install and maintain a Network consisting of Extreme EXOS/Universal Hardware switches.
c365a04a-08d7-4113-a8ab-a8f15c253422.name: Extreme Certified Professional - Extreme Switching

8ea26807-6d94-4877-8b35-0e3d9bbb458b.description: Earners of this certification will have been tested both practically and theoretically in all aspects covered in the classes that make up the Extreme Certified Professional syllabus in ExtremeCloud™ IQ – Controller. Thus, proving they have an excellent grasp of all the requirements needed to install and maintain a Network using ExtremeCloud™ IQ – Controller.
8ea26807-6d94-4877-8b35-0e3d9bbb458b.name: Extreme Certified Professional - ExtremeCloud IQ - Controller
